info.description:
Access the New, Used and Certified cars inventories for all Car Dealers in US.
The data is sourced from online listings by over 44,000 Car dealers in US. At any time, there are about 6.2M searchable listings (about 1.9M unique VINs) for Used & Certified cars and about 6.6M (about 3.9M unique VINs) New Car listings from all over US. We use this API at the back for our website www.marketcheck.com and our Android and iOS mobile apps too.
Few useful links :
  • A quick view of the API and the use cases is depicated here
  • The Postman collection with various usages of the API is shared here https://www.getpostman.com/collections/2752684ff636cdd7bac2
info.title: Marketcheck Cars

get.description:
This endpoint is the meat of the API and serves many purposes. This API produces a list of currently active cars from the market for the given search criteria. The API results are limited to allow pagination upto 1000 rows.
 The search API facilitates the following use cases -
1. Search Cars around a given geo-point within a given radius
2. Search cars for a specific year / make / model or combination of these
3. Search cars matching multiple year, make, model combinatins in the same search request
4. Filter results by most car specification attributes
5. Search for similar cars by VIN or Taxonomy VIN
6. Filter cars within a given price / miles / days on market (dom) range
7. Specify a sort order for the results on price / miles / dom / listed date
8. Search cars for a given City / State combination
9. Get Facets to build the search drill downs
10. Get Market averages for price/miles/dom/msrp for your search

parameters.description: Latitude component of location
parameters.name: latitude

parameters.description: Longitude component of location
parameters.name: longitude

parameters.description: Radius around the search location
parameters.name: radius

parameters.description: car search bases on zipcode
parameters.name: zip

parameters.description: Car type. Allowed values are - new / used / certified
parameters.name: car_type

parameters.description: Seller type to filter cars on. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique seller types. You can pass in multiple seller type values comma separated.
parameters.name: seller_type

parameters.description: Indicates whether car has had only one owner or not
parameters.name: carfax_1_owner

parameters.description: Indicates whether car has had any accidents or not
parameters.name: carfax_clean_title

parameters.description: Car year - 1980 onwards. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique years. You can pass in multiple year values comma separated.
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Car Make - should be a standard OEM Make name. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique make. You can pass in multiple make values separated by comma. e.g. ford,audi
parameters.name: make

parameters.description: Car model to search. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique model. You can pass in multiple model values comma separated for e.g f-150,Mustang.
parameters.name: model

parameters.description: Car trim to search. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique trim. You can pass in multiple trim values comma separated
parameters.name: trim

parameters.description: Dealer id to filter the cars.
parameters.name: dealer_id

parameters.description: Car vin to search
parameters.name: vin

parameters.description: Source to search cars. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique source. You can pass in multiple source values comma separated
parameters.name: source

parameters.description: Body type to filter the cars on. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique body types. You can pass in multiple body types comma separated.
parameters.name: body_type

parameters.description: Body subtype to filter the cars on. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique body subtypes. You can pass in multiple body subtype values comma separated
parameters.name: body_subtype

parameters.description: Vehicle type to filter the cars on. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique vehicle types. You can pass in multiple vehicle type values comma separated
parameters.name: vehicle_type

parameters.description: Comma separated list of 17 digit vins to search the matching cars for. Only 10 VINs allowed per request. If the request contains more than 10 VINs the first 10 VINs will be considered. Could be used as a More Like This or Similar Vehicles search for the given VINs. Ths vins parameter is an alternative to taxonomy_vins or ymmt parameters available with the search API. vins and taxonomy_vins parameters could be used to filter our cars with the exact build represented by the vins or taxonomy_vins whereas ymmt is a top level filter that does not filter cars by the build attributes like doors, drivetrain, cylinders, body type, body subtype, vehicle type etc
parameters.name: vins

parameters.description: Comma separated list of 10 letters excert from the 17 letter VIN. The 10 letters to be picked up from the 17 letter VIN are - first 8 letters and the 10th and 11th letter. E.g. For a VIN - 1FTFW1EF3EKE57182 the taxonomy vin would be - 1FTFW1EFEK  A taxonomy VIN identified a build of a car and could be used to filter our cars of a particular build. This is an alternative to the vin or ymmt parameters to the search API.
parameters.name: taxonomy_vins

parameters.description: Comma separated list of Year, Make, Model, Trim combinations. Each combination needs to have the year,make,model, trim values separated by a pipe '|' character in the form year|make|model|trim. e.g. 2010|Audi|A5,2014|Nissan|Sentra|S 6MT,|Honda|City|   You could just provide strings of the form - 'year|make||' or 'year|make|model' or '|make|model|' combinations. Individual year / make / model filters provied with the API calls will take precedence over the Year, Make, Model, Trim combinations. The Make, Model, Trim values must be valid values as per the Marketcheck Vin Decoder. If you are using a separate vin decoder then look at using the 'vins' or 'taxonomy_vins' parameter to the search api instead the year|make|model|trim combinations.
parameters.name: ymmt

parameters.description: Comma separated list of Year, Make, Model, Trim fields. For example - year,make,model,trim fields for which user wants to do an exact match
parameters.name: match

parameters.description: Cylinders to filter the cars on. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique cylinder values. You can pass in multiple cylinder values comma separated
parameters.name: cylinders

parameters.description: Transmission to filter the cars on. [a = Automatic, m = Manual]. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique transmission. You can pass in multiple transmission values comma separated
parameters.name: transmission

parameters.description: Speeds to filter the cars on. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique speeds. You can pass in multiple speeds values comma separated
parameters.name: speeds

parameters.description: Doors to filter the cars on. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique doors. You can pass in multiple doors values comma separated
parameters.name: doors

parameters.description: Drivetrain to filter the cars on. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique drivetrains. You can pass in multiple drivetrain values comma separated
parameters.name: drivetrain

parameters.description: Exterior color to match. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique exterior colors. You can pass in multiple exterior color values comma separated
parameters.name: exterior_color

parameters.description: Interior color to match. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique interior colors. You can pass in multiple interior color values comma separated
parameters.name: interior_color

parameters.description: Filter listings on engine
parameters.name: engine

parameters.description: Engine Type to match. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique engine types. You can pass in multiple engine type values comma separated
parameters.name: engine_type

parameters.description: Engine Aspiration to match. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique Engine Aspirations. You can pass in multiple Engine aspirations values comma separated
parameters.name: engine_aspiration

parameters.description: Engine Block to match. Valid filter values are those that our Search facets API returns for unique Engine Block. You can pass in multiple Engine Block values comma separated
parameters.name: engine_block

parameters.description: Miles range to filter cars with miles in the given range. Range to be given in the format - min-max e.g. 1000-5000
parameters.name: miles_range

parameters.description: Price range to filter cars with the price in the range given. Range to be given in the format - min-max e.g. 1000-5000
parameters.name: price_range

parameters.description: Days on Market range to filter cars with the DOM within the given range. Range to be given in the format - min-max e.g. 10-50
parameters.name: dom_range

parameters.description: Sort by field - allowed fields are distance|price|miles|dom|age|posted_at|year. Default sort field is distance from the given point
parameters.name: sort_by

parameters.description: Sort order - asc or desc. Default sort order is distance from a point.
parameters.name: sort_order

parameters.description: Number of results to return. Default is 10. Max is 50
parameters.name: rows

parameters.description: Page number to fetch the results for the given criteria. Default is 1. Pagination is allowed only till first 1000 results for the search and sort criteria. The page value can be only between 1 to 1000/rows
parameters.name: start

parameters.description: The comma separated list of fields for which facets are requested. Supported fields are - year, make, model, trim, vehicle_type, car_type, body_type, body_subtype, drivetrain, cylinders, transmission, exterior_color, interior_color, doors, engine_type, engine_aspiration, engine_block. Facets could be requested in addition to the listings for the search. Please note - The API calls with lots of facet fields may take longer to respond.
parameters.name: facets

parameters.description: The list of fields for which stats need to be generated based on the matching listings for the search criteria. Allowed fields are - price, miles, msrp, dom The stats consists of mean, max, average and count of listings based on which the stats are calculated for the field. Stats could be requested in addition to the listings for the search. Please note - The API calls with the stats fields may take longer to respond.
parameters.name: stats

parameters.description: Filter on Country, by default US. Search available on US (United States) and CA (Canada)
parameters.name: country

parameters.description: If plot has value true results in around 25k coordinates with limited fields to plot respective graph
parameters.name: plot

parameters.description: If nodedup is set to true then will give results using is_searchable
parameters.name: nodedup

parameters.description: Filter listsings on State
parameters.name: state

parameters.description: Filter listings on city
parameters.name: city

parameters.description: Filter listings on dealer_name
parameters.name: dealer_name

parameters.description: Filter listings on web scraped trim
parameters.name: trim_o

parameters.description: Filter trim on custom possible matches
parameters.name: trim_r

parameters.description: Active Days on Market range to filter cars with the DOM within the given range. Range to be given in the format - min-max e.g. 10-50
parameters.name: dom_active_range

parameters.description: Last 180 Days on Market range to filter cars with the DOM within the given range. Range to be given in the format - min-max e.g. 10-50
parameters.name: dom_180_range

parameters.description: Tokenizer search on options for multiple options use | as seperator
parameters.name: options

parameters.description: Tokenizer search on features for multiple options use | as seperator
parameters.name: features

200.description: List of all cars listings matching the search & filter criteria

dom.description: Average Days on Market value for the car based on all listings found in the Marketcheck database for this car

miles.description: Mean miles value for the car

msrp.description: Mean msrp value for the car

price.description: Mean price value for the car

units.description: No of units for this car on the market

BaseListing.description: Minimal set of attributes describing a listing

distance.description: Distance of the car's location from the specified user lcoation

dom.description: Days on Market value for the car based on current and historical listings found in the Marketcheck database for this car

dom_180.description: Days on Market value for the car based on current and last 6 month listings found in the Marketcheck database for this car

dom_active.description: Days on Market value for the car based on current and last 30 days listings found in the Marketcheck database for this car

first_seen_at.description: Listing first seen at first scraped timestamp

first_seen_at_date.description: Listing first seen at first scraped date

heading.description: Listing title as displayed on the source website

id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific listing from the Marketcheck database

last_seen_at.description: Listing last seen at (most recent) timestamp

last_seen_at_date.description: Listing last seen at (most recent) date

media.description: Car Media Attributes - main photo link/url and photo links

miles.description: Odometer reading / reported miles usage for the car

ref_miles.description: Last Odometer reading / reported miles usage for the car. If the asking miles value is not or is available then the last_miles could perhaps be used. last_miles is the miles for the car listed on the source website as of last_miles_dt date

ref_miles_dt.description: The date at which the last miles was reported online. This is earlier to last_seen_date

ref_price.description: Last reported price for the car. If the asking price value is not or is available then the last_price could perhaps be used. last_price is the price for the car listed on the source website as of last_price_dt date

ref_price_dt.description: The date at which the last price was reported online. This is earlier to last_seen_date

scraped_at_date.description: Listing first seen at first scraped date

vdp_url.description: Vehicle Details Page url of the specific car

cylinders.description: No of cylinders of the car

doors.description: No of doors of the car

avg_market_value.description: Estimated market value of year make model combination

avg_miles.description: Mileage of year make model combination

avg_price.description: Price of year make model combination

avg_market_value.description: Average market value of year make model combination

avg_miles.description: Average mileage of year make model combination

avg_price.description: Average price of year make model combination

dealer_type.description: Dealer type - independent, franchise, multi-brand, authorized

id.description: The unique id associated with the dealer in the Marketcheck database

rating.description: Overall rating of the dealership on scale 1-5

target_url_certified.description: Target url for the certified cars listing

target_url_new.description: Target url for the new cars listing

target_url_used.description: Target url for the used cars listing

DealerLandingPage.description: Describes the dealer landing page (SRP) HTML object

crawled_at.description: The timestamp indicating the time when the SRP was cached

html.description: The HTML string for the listing web page

overall_rating.description: Overall rating of the dealership on scale 1-5

current_value.description: Price of year make model combination

five_year_from_now.description: price after five year from now

five_year_from_now_percent.description: price depreciation percent after five year from now

one_year_from_now.description: price after one year from now

one_year_from_now_percent.description: price depreciation percent after one year from now

two_year_from_now.description: price after two year from now

two_year_from_now_percent.description: price depreciation percent after two year from now

ghg_emissions_indicator.description: Contains text like bad|Good|Very Good| Excellent

ghg_emissions_rating.description: Show vehicle impact on climate change in terms of greeenhouse gases. This rating will be in the range of 1 - 10

smog_indicator.description: Contains text like bad|Good|Very Good| Excellent

smog_rating.description: Shows vehicle's emissions of pollutants known to cause smog and other forms of air pollution. This rating will be in the range of 1 - 10

id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific listing from the Marketcheck database

vdp_url.description: Vehicle Details Page url of the specific car

first_seen_at.description: Listing first seen at first scraped timestamp

first_seen_at_date.description: Listing first seen at first scraped date

crawled_at.description: The timestamp indicating the time when the VDP was cached

html.description: The HTML string for the listing web page

Mds.description: Describes Market days supply results for year make model trim combination

color.description: Color depending upon left and right analysis numbers

difference.description: Difference depending upon left and right analysis

left.description: Left side rating for above description (2016 ford F-150 Lariat)

right.description: Right side rating for above description (All Other Cars)

text.description: Description for which popularity should be show eg: 2016 ford F-150 Lariat vs All Other Cars

thumbs.description: Thumbs up/down depending upon left and right analysis numbers

actual_rating.description: rating of car on that condition

actual_review.description: review of car given by current user

user_name.description: Name of user who has given review

user_rating.description: rating for dealer given by user ranging from 1-5

SafetyRating.description: Describes the Safety Ratings of current listing

driver_front_rating.description: Driver front rating of the Listing on scale 1-5

driver_side_rating.description: Driver Side rating of the Listing on scale 1-5

overall_rating.description: Overall rating of the Listing on scale 1-5

passenger_front_rating.description: Passenger front rating of the Listing on scale 1-5

roll_over_rating.description: Roll Over rating of the Listing on scale 1-5
